alert.note: Alert for Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover and south central Pender Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Castle Hayne, or 9 miles north of Wilmington, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Torrential rain. Dangerous Lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wrightsboro, Castle Hayne, Cape Fear Community College North Campus, Murrayville and Wilmington International Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 410 and 416. Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
